body_html:
Thanks for filing the issue @jmoney4769!

After some digging, I believe (but am not positive) that DynamicAttentionWrapper was renamed to just AttentionWrapper starting in v1.2.
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/seq2seq/AttentionWrapper

@lukaszkaiser can you confirm, and perhaps fix up the documentation? Or suggest someone who could? Thanks!
body_text:
Thanks for filing the issue @jmoney4769!
After some digging, I believe (but am not positive) that DynamicAttentionWrapper was renamed to just AttentionWrapper starting in v1.2.
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/seq2seq/AttentionWrapper
@lukaszkaiser can you confirm, and perhaps fix up the documentation?  Or suggest someone who could?  Thanks!
body:
Thanks for filing the issue @jmoney4769!

After some digging, I believe (but am not positive) that `DynamicAttentionWrapper` was renamed to just `AttentionWrapper` starting in v1.2.
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/seq2seq/AttentionWrapper

@lukaszkaiser can you confirm, and perhaps fix up the documentation?  Or suggest someone who could?  Thanks!
